name: Viki Spotter: Undersea
description: This time, the curious Viki has decided to explore the unknown depths of the sea. And, of course, she won't be able to do so without your keen eye and precise atrention. Help Viki find all the possible differences in the pairs of pictures that you see and join her on a wonderful journey!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 2 GB available space
